title: Charging issue on pixel 2xl
content: Iam facing charging issue approx from 2 months like April, may 2019. Whenever iam connecting charger it seems like connection is loose need to adjust the charger to charge pixel 2xl, now a days it almost doesn't charge, after factory reset problem seems to be there but now it's little less than before. And my pixel 2xl also don't support earphone using USB C to 3.5mm adaptor. Can anyone help?
